title: Nintendo Can Do YouTube Better - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.16.17
description:
Achievement Hunter's Jack Pattillo joins Greg to talk about Nintendo's YouTube policy, a dev's thoughts on microtransactions, and more!

00:01:30 - Housekeeping
Win Andrea Trending Gamer! Vote once every 24 hours. On Google, type in "trending gamer vote" in the search bar.
Party Mode up: Smash on YT, Nidhog 2 on Patreon
The Roper Report   -
00:02:30 - Nintendo sells a lot of hardware
00:07:55 - Even YouTube thinks Nintendo can do better, via Polygon
00:13:30 - Battlefront devs update, via IGN
00:18:00 - Rami Ismail from Vlambeer turned us on to Damion Schubert, developer/CD at Bossfight
00:32:40 - Double XP in Destiny 2 this week, via Polygon
00:38:40 - The official list of upcoming games
 Reader mail   -
00:42:08 - How do you guys define where the line is, and can you know if you're crossing it before it's too late?  - French Stewart
00:50:30 - The PSX 2017 exhibitors list has been released, is sucker Punch's absence a sign that it will take longer than say early 2019 before we see this game? - Tavin Bothel
00:52:40 - Whos games can we play at PSX? - Gamefreak55
00:54:30 - Squad Up - Mack: Battle.net/Destiny 2
Tomorrow’s host: Tim
